data.title: Bruce Willis' wife, and ex Demi Moore both share emotional Father's Day posts
data.meta_description: This Father's Day, Bruce Willis was celebrated by all the incredible women in his life, as his wife Emma Heming Willis, his ex-wife Demi Moore, and all of his children shared a heartfelt post together
data.text:
On Father's Day Bruce Willis was showered in love from the women in his life receiving a heartfelt shoutout from both his wife Emma Heming Willis, ex-wife Demi Moore, and all of his children.

The family took to Instagram celebrating the former Die Hard star by sharing a series of throwback snaps from his days as a young dad as he raised his five daughters. Bruce and his ex-wife Moore share three daughters including their 35-year-old Rumer 32-year-old Scout, and 30-year-old Tallulah. He also shares two daughters with his current wife Emma - 12-year-old Mabel Ray and 10-year-old Evelyn Penn.

The joint post shared by Emma, Demi, Tallulah, Rumer, and Scout showcased Bruce being a loving father over the years including a precious recent snap of his daughter Scout caressing the 69-year-old retired actor's face. Underneath the series of sweet snaps, the group simply captioned the post: "Happy Father’s Day to our favorite girl dad. We love you, BW!"

Fans of Bruce took to the comments of the post gushing over the sentiment and sharing their own love for the legendary actor. One fan wrote: "Honestly…. The best… you girls are Blessed indeed as he is to have you." Another commented: "So time flies, we will remember him from the movie The 5th Element. Happy Father's Day."

A third added: "Such a gorgeous man! Talented actor! Total package." Another brought up Bruce's ongoing battle with frontotemporal dementia and wrote: "This is beautiful. I understand I'm a daughter who had to go through the same thing and watching a very strong man strong-minded man turn into a different man sometimes it's hard to explain but I understand. Happy Father's Day to Papa."

This comes as his daughter Rumer recently shared how Bruce is not only an incredible dad but also the best grandfather. Despite his health struggles, Bruce has grown to share a strong bond with her young daughter. During an appearance on the Today show, Rumer spoke about her dad's relationship with his 13-month-old granddaughter Louetta and said: "It's so nice because I feel like my dad is just like - he's a girl dad, through and through. It almost unlocks that kind of little-kid, girl-dad thing. He's so sweet with her."
